description_html: Fiandre introduces the West Loop porcelain flooring collection offering unprecedented textures and neutral colors that allow endless interior design combinations with various styles of furnishings. Industrial references create high-tech light-and-shadow effects, giving surfaces a dynamic three-dimensional appeal. West Loop (named for the emerging Chicago neighborhood and resembling textured industrial concrete) is unique due to its high variance in color including 35 shading patterns, with metal undertones. Four colors (Anthracite, Sand, Grey and White) are available in the following sizes, 24x48, 24x24, 12x24, 8x48, 12x12 mosaic and 4x12 diamond.
